Name: Remy Raccoon and the Lost Temple
About the game: Join Remy Raccoon on a perilous journey through the Lost Temple. Explore over 100 levels filled with fiendish traps and malevolent creatures collecting gems as you go. Be warned though, only the bravest adventurer will collect all the gems and progress to the next level. Game modes Play in Adventure Mode to unlock new levels. Face an unpredictable set of challenges in Random Mode . Replay some of your favourite levels as endurance challenges in Survival Mode . Complete bonus challenges along the way to unlock idols. Complete all the idol challenges to unlock the legendary Idol of Dominion. Your adventure awaits...
